name: Rushing Roulette
description:
Rushing Roulette

This game was made by four students from the Lycée des Arts et Métiers as a group project. It's an auto racing game in which you need to reach the end goal as fast as possible with as few collisions as possible. This project is still a work in progress


Obstacles
  • Cars you need to avoid
  • Ice that inverts controls
  • Puddles that make you slip in a random direction
Controls
  • A/D to move sideways
  • W/S to accelerate and decelerate (careful, moving faster can be dangerous!)
Future additions
  • Timer and high score
  • More art and assets
  • Sound
  • More levels to come
Feedback Form

Once played through, feel free to fill out the form at the following link
